body:
fixes #12800 
closes #12758 

This PR introduces the latest version of UPC++ (2019.9.0), fixes an issue with the compiler passed on to the UPC++ install script (to get the full path to the actual compiler instead of Spack's compiler wrapper) in order to achieve the correct behavior when doing `spack load upcxx`.
It also removes the warning messages that were printed out when detecting the presence of a scheduler (slurm, alps, etc.) and thus supersedes pull request #12758 .
title: Upcxx/2019.9.0
